The Flying Ship

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 362
flyingmaxtotalsize [flyingmaxtotalsize]: 500
flyingmapmove [flyingmapmove]: 26

Requires 40A to forge (A5)

This golden ship is able to grow and shrink whenever it is needed. The owner of the ship will be able to fly across the land with an entire army.
